visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a solid gauge chart. The chart should have a title 'Performance Gauge'. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include a single series named 'Performance' with a value of 63. Custom colors should be used for the chart elements. Additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a solid gauge chart with a title 'Performance Gauge'. The chart type is set to 'solidgauge', and it includes specific styling for the title, axes, and labels. The title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 24px. The y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 20px and a medium gray color. The chart includes a single data series named 'Performance' with a value of 63, styled with a green color and a font size of 30px. The chart also includes custom colors for the background and plot lines. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and disabling the legend.
